settings.code:
<style>
h1.main-faq-title {color: black;
font-weight: 500;
font-size: 45px;}
h3.main-faq-sub-title {
    color: #73994b;
    font-weight: 500;
}
button#btn-faq-search {
border-radius: 0px 8px 8px 0px;
    background: #f6931d;}
form#faq-search-form input {
    height: 43px;
}
.categories-card {
    border-radius: 8px;}
.card-selected {
    border: 3px solid #73994b;}

.accordion {
background-color: #f5f7f3;
    color: #000;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #73994b;
margin-bottom: 10px;}
#shopify-section-template--14464109215790__main > div > div > div > div > div.faqs-content > div:nth-child(1) > h3 {text-align: center; padding-bottom: 20px;}
.categories-grid {margin-bottom: 20px;}
@media (max-width: 767px){
.categories-card {
    width: 44%;}
h1.main-faq-title {font-size: 30px;}
h3.main-faq-sub-title  {font-size: 22px; text-align: center !important;}
}
</style>
